title: How to Make an All American Mexican Fiesta

steps.headline: You need to become ambitious enough to decide to actually make a burrito instead of simply heat up a frozen one
Gather the Ingredients you choose to use
Heat up the refried beans on a stove top or in a microwave, mix in some salsa as you heat them up.
steps.description: Also you should now start to cook the rice. This should be started well before you plan on being really hungry. Now would be a good time to throw your drink of choice in the freezer for a faster chill time

steps.headline: If you choose to also prepare fries or tots now is the time to put them in the oven
Cut up the vegetables and shred the cheese
When the rice is done and the beans seem to be about burrito temperature turn off the burners and spread some on a tortilla
Load it up with all the vegetables you feel like eating
Now its time to pull out the fries/tots.
steps.description: Put a very generous helping on the plate next to the work in progress burrito.

steps.headline: It's time for the sauce.
steps.description: Apply sour cream and guacamole to the burrito. Now dab on some hot sauce or salsa as needed. Don't forget the fries/tots. You may need the assistance of a condiment, the choice is yours.

steps.headline: The all important fold.
steps.description: Take both ends and fold them over the ingredients. Now Take both side one after the other, across the burrito. This should make a good seal.

steps.headline: Grab your now frosty cold drink and place yourself in your choice eating environment.

text: You need to become ambitious enough to decide to actually make a burrito instead of simply heat up a frozen one  Gather the Ingredients you choose to use  Heat up the refried beans on a stove top or in a microwave, mix in some salsa as you heat them up. Also you should now start to cook the rice. This should be started well before you plan on being really hungry. Now would be a good time to throw your drink of choice in the freezer for a faster chill time If you choose to also prepare fries or tots now is the time to put them in the oven  Cut up the vegetables and shred the cheese  When the rice is done and the beans seem to be about burrito temperature turn off the burners and spread some on a tortilla  Load it up with all the vegetables you feel like eating  Now its time to pull out the fries/tots. Put a very generous helping on the plate next to the work in progress burrito. It's time for the sauce. Apply sour cream and guacamole to the burrito. Now dab on some hot sauce or salsa as needed. Don't forget the fries/tots. You may need the assistance of a condiment, the choice is yours. The all important fold. Take both ends and fold them over the ingredients. Now Take both side one after the other, across the burrito. This should make a good seal. Grab your now frosty cold drink and place yourself in your choice eating environment.
